## notes
this function calls CleanHla() before the evaluation<br>

## evaluation logic
1. if both alleles are NA in donor or recipient, then set mis-match value to 999<br>
2. if dornor's hla matches with **any** of recipient's, then mis-match is 0<br>else mis-match is 1
